title: Morse Code
alt: Oh, because Facebook has worked out SO WELL for everyone.
transcript:
[Cueball and Megan are lying in a grassy, lonely plain.]Cueball: When the French navy retired morse code in 1997, they broadcast a final message: "Calling all. This is our last cry before our eternal silence."Cueball: I wonder if I can find my Livejournal login.
Megan: Hey, I like Livejournal.
Cueball: It's a nice place to go for some peace and quiet, I suppose.
